name: DYSTORIA
description: The year is 1984 and you've been specially selected to represent the best that Earth has to offer. Have you got what it takes to tackle all six-axis in this neon retro shooter, battling to the sounds of synthwave beats, navigating a labyrinth at every angle?
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.7 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 840 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
